title: Minority Report
description: Imagine a future where crimes can be detected before they are committed, and criminals are convicted and sentenced for crimes before committing them. This is the scenario of Philip K. Dick's classic story, now filmed by Steven Spielberg.In addition to 'Minority Report' this collection includes nine other outstanding short stories by the twentieth century's outstanding sf master, three of which have been made into feature films.This collection includes the following stories:- Minority Report- Imposter- Second Variety- War Game- What the Dead Men Say- Oh, to Be a Blobel!- The Electric Ant- Faith of Our Fathers- We Can Remember it for You Wholesale (the basis for "Total Recall")
author: Philip K Dick
